org.opentcs.drivers.vehicle

Interface VehicleControllerPool


  • public interface VehicleControllerPool
    Maintains associations between vehicles and vehicle controllers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getSimulationTimeFactor()
      Deprecated. 
      Simulation is out of scope for the openTCS project. Simulation-related components should be configured individually.
      VehicleController getVehicleController(java.lang.String vehicleName)
      Returns the vehicle controller associated with the vehicle with the given name.
      void setSimulationTimeFactor(double factor)
      Deprecated. 
      Simulation is out of scope for the openTCS project. Simulation-related components should be configured individually.

    • Method Detail

      • getVehicleController

        @Nonnull
VehicleController getVehicleController(java.lang.String vehicleName)
        Returns the vehicle controller associated with the vehicle with the given name. If no vehicle controller is associated with it or if there is no vehicle with the given name, a null-object equivalent will be returned.
        Parameters:
        vehicleName - The name of the vehicle for which to return the vehicle controller.
        Returns:
        the vehicle controller associated with the vehicle with the given name, or a null-object equivalent.

      • getSimulationTimeFactor

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
double getSimulationTimeFactor()
        Deprecated. Simulation is out of scope for the openTCS project. Simulation-related components should be configured individually.
        Returns the current time factor for simulation.
        Returns:
        The current time factor for simulation.

      • setSimulationTimeFactor

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
void setSimulationTimeFactor(double factor)
                                                                                                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Deprecated. Simulation is out of scope for the openTCS project. Simulation-related components should be configured individually.
        Sets a time factor for simulation.
        Parameters:
        factor - The time factor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given value is 0.0 or smaller.
